*Mantella stares* Mantella: Hmm. *Than she walks up to Quickstrike* Mantell=
a: I wish to you.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 8:20 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo B=
east Wars


  "oh...." said Sinesis as he caught the energy of her eye lase=
rs and stored that energy for later..... "autoguns, reconize the Mantis her=
e and Dark Mouse as friends..." he said... "quickstrike is ove there...." h=
e said, pointing at Quickstrike...he disappeared back into the catacombs of=
 the Predacon base......
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovea=
lllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 8:05 =
PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Mantella jumps to the side and ro=
lls out of the way* Mantella: I was looking for Quickstrike! *She says as s=
he continues shooting eye lasers at Sinesis*
      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday=
, May 19, 2000 7:53 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Sinesis ra=
ises his arms and gets hit in the arm while protecting his face.... "same t=
eam as Dark Mouse? the traitor! computer, fire upon dark Mouse when he ariv=
es!...." commands Sinesis.... "now you will pay, worshipper of Hell Beast!.=
.." he said, swooping behind Mantella and attempting to roll her up in a Sc=
hoolboy Pin for some more beating.........
        ----- Original Message -=
---- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
  Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:44 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
        *Mantella stares and frowns* Mantella: OOHHH!! THIS IS WHAT I GET F=
OR COMING TO JOIN UP IN THE SAME TEAM THAT DARK MOUSE IS IN!!!!! *She says =
as she starts running while shooting her eye lasers at Sinesis*
          -=
---- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:29 PM
          Subject=
: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Sinesis is knocked down..he laughs.... "ni=
ce one you are, but see how you go far.....ah! now i'm starting to act like=
 that rhyming bot! yuck!...." he said......he looked up at tthe autoguns.. =
"autoguns, target this one!..." he said, pointing to Mantella.....
        =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
      =
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:17 P=
M
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            *Mantella, Not seei=
ng Senesis gets shot in the back. She climbs to her feet and begins shootin=
g eye lasers at Sinesis*
              ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
        From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              =
Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:08 PM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast War=
s


              Sinesis heard someone ask for a job....Hell Beast troop..=
.he thought...he walked back around, then popped out firing at Mantella ful=
l blast.........
                ----- Original Message ----- 
            =
    From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        =
        Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 6:53 PM
                Subject: Neo Bea=
st Wars


                *Mantella walks up to the Predacon base* Mantella=
: Hey, Let me in. I want a job!
